articles.author: Phil Lutton
articles.title: Kyrgios not on board with Federer's vision of merged tennis tour - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Roger Federer has been supported in his desire to merge the ATP and WTA Tours but not everyone is fully convinced, including Australia's Nick Kyrgios.
articles.content: Tennis remains a convoluted sport, with the grand slams (run by their own boards) and the International Tennis Federation (ITF) also in play. It's not always seamless, with the ATP Cup's shared arrangement with the WTA's Brisbane International generating fric… [+2931 chars]
